text: Masterwort is a common name for several plants in the family Apiaceae and may refer to: *Astrantia, a genus with several plant species cultivated as ornamentals *Heracleum, a genus of plants known for their phototoxic effects *Peucedanum ostruthium, a species used as an herbal flavoring *Aegopodium podagraria, a species that is sometimes called English masterwort or wild masterwort
title: Masterwort
